State Tournament Practice Party

March 6 @ 3:10 pm - 7:00 pm

Event Navigation

  • Missouri State Championship »

Rolla Robotics will again host a practice party for teams competing in the Missouri State Championship Tournament. Our practice field will be available for testing and it’s a great way to get a head start on scouting your competition and potential alliance partners for the tournament.
